body_html:
I am not aware of a nccl binary for Windows from NVIDIA. That does not mean it does not exist. You can use hierarchical copy and get the same or very similar performance.

body:
I am not aware of a nccl binary for Windows from NVIDIA.  That does not
mean it does not exist.  You can use hierarchical copy and get the same or
very similar performance.

On Mon, Sep 17, 2018, 7:07 PM guptapriya <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @tfboyd <https://github.com/tfboyd> - do you know what needs to be done
> for getting nccl to run with windows?
